OrgName.entry: SHOOTERS GROVE CHILDRENS CENTRE OUTREACH ADVICE SESSION

Desc.entry: Run by Hillsborough and Area Advice Service (see separate entry). Session is for those who are pregnant or have a child aged 6 years and under.

Address.entry: c/o Hillsborough and Area Advice Service

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Every 2nd Tues 9.30-11.30am, please contact for details
